column1: Little Goat Diner////I stopped in here to get the goat liver and some bread and both were excellent. The artisan bread they sold me was very rustic looking
column2: feeling and tasting. Hearty and balanced
column3: I wish I could afford a $10 loaf every week. The Goat liver pate I got here tasted like any other live pate I've ever had and was $13 for a very small jar. My guests were impressed with the fact that I served it on a cheese plate
column4: but beyond that I think I'll go elsewhere next time.
